text: The Horse Whisperer is a 1998 American drama movie directed by Robert Redford (who also stars) and was based on the 1995 novel of the same name by Nicholas Evans. It also stars Kristin Scott Thomas, Scarlett Johansson, Sam Neill, Dianne Wiest, Christien Anholt, Chris Cooper, Jeanette Nolan and was distributed by Touchstone Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1998 drama movies Category:1990s epic movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Robert Redford Category:Movies set in Montana Category:Movies about horses
title: The Horse Whisperer
